NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist. Don't worry, our internationalization magic is still hard at work on other parts of the app. Feel free to navigate back to explore more!

hero.title: About our company
hero.desc: The International Expert Center is a collaborative platform that brings together experts from various fields striving to implement advanced ideas and solutions. We gather specialists, researchers, and practitioners ready to share their experience and knowledge, as well as collaborate to achieve sustainable development and innovative breakthroughs. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals with extensive experience and successful cases.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.desc: Our mission is to create a platform for the exchange of knowledge and experience between experts, as well as to promote the implementation of innovative solutions in various fields. We are actively working on quality content, conducting research, organizing events, and building cooperation networks. We believe that joint actions can lead to significant changes and growth.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.desc: We strive to create a space for cooperation and dialogue between specialists from different fields. Our goal is to form a society where knowledge and skills are effectively used to solve current problems and for overall development. We believe that through cooperation, it is possible to achieve harmony and sustainability on a global level.

list.title: Language Training/Foreign Languages
list.description: English language courses for all ages: Learn English for various purposes ‚Äì from everyday communication to professional activities.

list.title: International Communication
list.description: Preparation for negotiations at various levels: Developing negotiation skills, effective communication with international partners, conflict resolution, and achieving mutually beneficial agreements.

list.title: Mentoring and Coaching
list.description: Educational courses, trainings. Masterminds and supervisions for experts/trainers. Business mentoring: Providing expert support and consultations for aspiring entrepreneurs and managers of small and medium-sized businesses. Sports coaching: Developing sports skills and achieving goals in sports through individual support and training. Sports mentoring for all categories: Supporting athletes of all levels, from beginners to professionals, in achieving their goals.

list.title: Social Adaptation and Integration
list.description: Program for the social adaptation of active military personnel, law enforcement employees, and post‚Äëmilitary integration. Providing assistance to people in social adaptation, support, and integration into society.

list.title: Management Development
list.description: Enhancing the skills and competencies of leaders and managers to improve their ability to effectively manage teams, projects, and the organization as a whole. Courses, trainings, coaching, and mentoring programs tailored to the specific needs of participants.

list.title: Business Analytics and Promotion
list.description: Project analytics: Conducting project analysis to determine their effectiveness, identify risks, and develop recommendations for improvement. PR business promotion: Developing and implementing business promotion strategies, strengthening the company's reputation, and attracting new clients.

list.title: Research and Development
list.description: Publications and reports. Development of new models, methods, and concepts aimed at solving specific problems of business and society. Collaboration and partnership. Consulting. Conducting seminars and educational programs.

list.title: Supportive Community
list.description: A community for collaboration, intervision, and supervision. A dynamic community for experts from all fields to exchange experience, develop their practice, and boost their expertise.

hero.badge: Course ¬´COACHING FOR ACTIVE MILITARY PERSONNEL AND VETERANS¬ª
hero.title: OUR SERVICES
hero.subtitle: Educational author's programs of various directions, unique products and materials

cta.long: S I G N   U P   F O R   T H E   C O U R S E !

cards.label: Author's methodology
cards.title: ¬´COACHING FOR ACTIVE MILITARY PERSONNEL AND VETERANS¬ª

details.label: Inside information: Course 1
details.title: Eight-level training course ¬´EXPERT ‚Äì PRO¬ª
details.lead: TOP-EXPERT with professional competencies in self-positioning and personal branding, as well as coaching and mentoring. With issuance of a verified certificate of established form.

meta.label: Duration
meta.value: 8 months / 256 hours (2 days per month, 16 hours of main training + 16 hours of practice).

meta.label: Course goal
meta.value: To prepare highly qualified experts capable of developing personal brands and creating original products.

meta.label: Prerequisites
meta.value: Having any coach/mentor certificate or related qualification is welcome.

extras: All students practice in the active supporting community ¬´A-PRO Community¬ª.
The course is protected by copyright and is intellectual property according to the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan and the Berne Convention.

details.label: Inside information: Course 2
details.title: Language training ¬´CONFIDENT ENGLISH¬ª
details.lead: Unique intensive English course ¬´CONFIDENT ENGLISH¬ª. Duration: 3 months, 54 hours total (2 times per week, 1.5 hours main classes + 1 time per week, 1.5 hours conversation club).

meta.label: Duration
meta.value: 3 months / 54 academic hours (2 classes + 1 Speaking club per week).

meta.label: Course goal
meta.value: To provide participants with solid knowledge and confident communication skills for real-world use ‚Äî in career, travel, and everyday communication.

meta.label: Prerequisites
meta.value: English proficiency level from A1 to B1. Without English knowledge ‚Äî individual classes under separate conditions.

extras: All students practice in the weekly ¬´English Mastery¬ª Speaking club for 1.5 hours.
The program is aimed at developing conversational and professional competencies, overcoming language barriers, and building confidence.

details.label: Inside information: Course 3
details.title: ¬´COACHING FOR ACTIVE MILITARY PERSONNEL AND VETERANS¬ª
details.lead: The course is in the stage of intellectual property registration.
extras: Publication of the program and enrollment will appear after completion of legal procedures.

details.label: Inside information: Course 4
details.title: Leadership training course ¬´HEALTHY TEAM¬ª
details.lead: The course is in the stage of intellectual property registration.
extras: Stay tuned for updates ‚Äî detailed program, schedule, and participation conditions will be announced soon.
